com.att.aro.model

Enum BluetoothInfo.BluetoothState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<BluetoothInfo.BluetoothState>
      • com.att.aro.model.BluetoothInfo.BluetoothState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<BluetoothInfo.BluetoothState>
    Enclosing class:
    BluetoothInfo

    public static enum BluetoothInfo.BluetoothState
extends java.lang.Enum<BluetoothInfo.BluetoothState>
    The BluetoothInfo.BluetoothState Enumeration specifies constant values that describe the connectivity state of the Bluetooth peripheral on a device. This enumeration is part of the BluetoothInfo class.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      BLUETOOTH_CONNECTED
      The Bluetooth peripheral is connected.
      BLUETOOTH_DISCONNECTED
      The Bluetooth peripheral is disconnected.
      BLUETOOTH_TURNED_OFF
      The Bluetooth peripheral is switched off.
      BLUETOOTH_UNKNOWN
      The Bluetooth peripheral is of an unknown type.
